name: BEAR
reviews: Wanted to get a few activities completed and waited until I had to charge it before posting this review. Once I saw the Fenix 7x Sapphire was announced, immediately purchased on the same day.

name: MILO
reviews: Perfect replacement for my Forunner 735XT (see photos for comparison). The saphire solar is only a few grams heavier and otherwise identical in size.

name: BENTLEY
reviews: Wanted to get a few activities completed and waited until I had to charge it before posting this review. Once I saw the Fenix 7x Sapphire was announced, immediately purchased on the same day.

name: OLLIE
reviews: Absolutely zero regrets with the F7x. Once I saw the Fenix 7x Sapphire was announced, immediately purchased on the same day.

name: BUDDY
reviews: Awesome Watch. Upgraded from the Garmin Fenix 6 Titanium Sapphire at 47mm a few months ago, and got the Garmin Fenix 7S, Gold Titanium Sapphire Solar Watch.

name: ROCKY
reviews: I had the Fenix 6 Sapphire Titanium watch previously, and in the middle of waiting for my Fenix 7, tried a few others like the FitBit and Forerunner.
